titles.title: It was alone the Savior prayed

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: It was alone the Savior prayed In dark Gethsemane; Alone He drained the bitter cup And suffered there for me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Alone, alone, He bore it all alone; He gave Himself to save His own, He suffered, bled and died alone, alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It was alone the Savior stood In Pilateâ€™s judgment hall; Alone the crown of thorns He wore, Forsaken thus by all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Alone upon the cross He hung That others He might save; Forsaken then by God and man. Alone, His life He gave.
